/**
 * Logger utility that respects environment settings
 * Only logs in development or when debug mode is explicitly enabled
 */class Logger{constructor(){this.isDevelopment=void 0;this.isDebugEnabled=void 0;this.isDevelopment=process.env.NODE_ENV==='development';this.isDebugEnabled=process.env.REACT_APP_DEBUG_MODE==='true';}shouldLog(level){// Always allow errors and warnings
if(level==='error'||level==='warn'){return true;}// For debug and info, only log in development or if debug is explicitly enabled
return this.isDevelopment||this.isDebugEnabled;}debug(message){if(this.shouldLog('debug')){for(var _len=arguments.length,args=new Array(_len>1?_len-1:0),_key=1;_key<_len;_key++){args[_key-1]=arguments[_key];}console.log("\uD83D\uDD0D [DEBUG] ".concat(message),...args);}}info(message){if(this.shouldLog('info')){for(var _len2=arguments.length,args=new Array(_len2>1?_len2-1:0),_key2=1;_key2<_len2;_key2++){args[_key2-1]=arguments[_key2];}console.log("\u2139\uFE0F [INFO] ".concat(message),...args);}}warn(message){if(this.shouldLog('warn')){for(var _len3=arguments.length,args=new Array(_len3>1?_len3-1:0),_key3=1;_key3<_len3;_key3++){args[_key3-1]=arguments[_key3];}console.warn("\u26A0\uFE0F [WARN] ".concat(message),...args);}}error(message){if(this.shouldLog('error')){for(var _len4=arguments.length,args=new Array(_len4>1?_len4-1:0),_key4=1;_key4<_len4;_key4++){args[_key4-1]=arguments[_key4];}console.error("\u274C [ERROR] ".concat(message),...args);}}// API-specific logging
apiRequest(message,data){if(this.shouldLog('debug')){console.log("\uD83C\uDF10 [API] ".concat(message),data||'');}}apiResponse(message,data){if(this.shouldLog('debug')){console.log("\uD83D\uDCE1 [RESPONSE] ".concat(message),data||'');}}// User action logging
userAction(message,data){if(this.shouldLog('info')){console.log("\uD83D\uDC64 [USER] ".concat(message),data||'');}}// Cache operations
cache(message,data){if(this.shouldLog('debug')){console.log("\uD83D\uDCBE [CACHE] ".concat(message),data||'');}}}// Export singleton instance
export const logger=new Logger();export default logger;
